messages.subject: Brass Zogan
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All, I was just reading the article by John Berta dealing with brass inlay in tsuba. Some fine examples were included in the article. When I started to
messages.messageBody:
Hello All, I was just reading the article by John Berta dealing with
brass inlay in tsuba. Some fine examples were included in the article.
When I started to read it I was hoping, aha, maybe I''ll finally be
able to peghole a simple tsuba I have. I'm afraid the tsuba is too
simple and displays too few characteristics for me to attribute it to
any school. So, I leave it up to you all. I hope someone may enlighten
me. Thanks, John

The two sides are at: John's Stuff, BrassZogan1 & 2
